channel.title: H€lp Pl€a$€
channel.description: Hello, i have two sources one has when you teleport to barrows there are 1 monster and each kill and they drop the keys then the other source has when you teleport to barrows you have to dig to find the monster with the secret tunnel and ect. how to change the one with 1 one monster to the one where you dig to find the monsters?

item.title: H€lp Pl€a$€
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

Rip it out of the source where you dig. Look for send-messages like “you open the coffin” for the open-coffin methods. Do that for all the others, OR you can make it from scratch which you should do but probably don’t know how to. Just look at your source that has the digging in it, you can learn a-lot more from browsing your files than you can from a tutorial.

P.S. A send-message is where a message appears in the chat-box. For instance “You dig and find nothing interesting”. Your send-message method is probably something like one of these:

sM
sendmessage
Send

You get the picture.

Read full topic
